clear.text: clear all activities from manager stack

closeAllExcept.text:
* Close all activities in manager except activity with corresponded name
	 * @param {string} name - activity name

init.text:
* Initialize activity
	 * @param {object} intent - required data for activity
	 * @param {object} state - init activity state

pop.text: Pop current top activity from manager stack

popWithState.text: Pop current top activity from manager stack and send state to the top activity

push.text:
* Push activity in manager activities stack to show it
	 * @param {string} name - activity name
	 * @param {object} intent - required data for activity
	 * @param {object} state - init activity state

removeActivity.text:
* Remove activity from stack by its name
	 * @param {string} name - activity name

replaceTopActivity.text:
* Replace top activity with new one
	 * @param {string} name - activity name
	 * @param {object} intent - required data for activity
	 * @param {object} state - init activity state

setIntent.text:
* Change activity intent
	 * @param {object} state - init activity state
	 * @param {string} name - activity name

setState.text:
* Change activity state
	 * @param {object} state - init activity state
	 * @param {string} name - activity name
